overview:
Mark Munoz is the founder and CEO of InvestLab.

He has over 10 years in the financial technology and brokerage operations space while operating multiple start-up companies in the securities industry. Most recently, Mark launched the Asian technology and brokerage services of Penson Asia. Prior to that, he served as a Senior Vice President of Nexa Technologies and VP of Brokerage America (now TD Ameritrade).

Originally from Texas, Mark holds a bachelors degree from the College of William and Mary in Virginia. He has lived and worked in San Francisco, Orange County, and Dallas, Texas but currently resides in Hong Kong.
